name: LazyEclipse
description:
basically [Lazy Dark Reader - Re-written]
a blanket dark theme for scanlator/translator websites (very lazy coding)
additional_info:
I now know how to exlude sites that my style was previously %@&3ing, like Goglul for instance, also you2Be & bing, so i did, it still #@!$'s with them, but at least they are usable now right?
=====================================================================
[NOT Updating lazydarkreader]
I will be updating&using LazyEclipse from now on. 
it is basically lazydarkreader but "better" coded.
"better" for me.
to be lazy about updating it.
to be lazy about changing it.
======================================================================
significanty less lines of code to improve page loading time.
now works on all websites...
even the ones you didnt want :3 so turn it off when not reading a thing.
=======================================================================
(here are my random complaints. DONT READ)
credit to:
#duplicate txt deletion tools for being needlessly complicated, how you only can scan per-line based was realy annoying.

#Notepad++ for being the main(only) way i could solve the issues with the dupicate txt deletion tools. woud be nice if you could just have dont that for me notepad++.

#The people who read this. I TOLD YOU NOT TO!
